content.0: Committing to build your own home is a decision that should not affect your life quality. GIF-CO offers you a turnkey service. An offer made to answer to your requirements in real estate.
content.1: The turnkey service takes your budget evaluation. The purchase of secure land with a study of your geographical location soil. Architecture plan and conception, technical studies estimated and quantitative estimates. The choice of construction materials, delivery date and your future residence price.
content.2: The turnkey service is also a personalized service which permits you to enjoy your home comfort.
